LanguageData.VREH_Label_onlyVanillaWeapon: Aptitudes are only for vanilla weapons
LanguageData.VREH_ToolTip_onlyVanillaWeapon:
If enabled, weapon aptitudes genes will not be generated for mods.
A restart is required.
LanguageData.VREH_ToolTip_allowNonBiocodableWeapon:
If disabled, genes will not be generated for non-biocodable weapons.
A restart is required.
